peril.views.slick.io

Class MapReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.io.FileParser
      • peril.views.slick.io.MapReader

  • public final class MapReader
extends FileParser
    Reader the map from a specified SaveFile and uses that to construct the SlickBoard and all its SlickCountrys, SlickContinents, SlickUnits. In addition of this it restores the state of the game.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.05
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli
    See Also:
    FileParser, SaveFile

      Holds the Image which denotes the shapes of the SlickCountrys.

      Holds the GameController which contains the SlickBoard this MapReader.

      The SlickModelView that allows the MapReader to add visual elements of the game.

      • parseUnit

        private void parseUnit(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parsed a String array into the details into a new SlickUnit.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The name of the ModelUnit
        2. The strength of the ModelUnit
        3. The file name of the image that denotes the SlickUnits image.

      • parseCountry

        private void parseCountry(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parses a String array of details into a new SlickCountry.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The name of the ModelCountry
        2. The RGB value of the country Color on the countries Image
        3. The army strength
        4. The x army offset
        5. The y army offset
        6. The number of the player that rules the country

      • parseArmy

        private ModelArmy parseArmy(java.lang.String armyStr)
        Processes an a string into a ModelArmy.
        Parameters:
        armyStr - The string representation of a ModelArmy.
        Returns:
        The ModelArmy specified by the string.

      • parseContinent

        private void parseContinent(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parses a String array of details into a new SlickContinent. This method will check countries for SlickCountrys that are denoted in the map file.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The name of the ModelContinent
        2. The hazard that plagues this ModelContinent
        3. The names of all the countries in the continent separated by a '-'

      • parseLink

        private void parseLink(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parses a String array of details into link between two SlickCountrys. This method will check countries for SlickCountrys that are denoted in the map file.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The name of first country in the link.
        2. The name of second country in the link.

      • parsePlayer

        private void parsePlayer(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parses a SlickPlayer from a String array of details.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The player number
        2. The players distributable army strength.
        3. The boolean of whether the player has NOT lost.

      • parseState

        private void parseState(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parses a InteractiveState from a String array of details.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The name of the games state.
        2. The number of the current player.
        3. The round number.

      • parseUnitsKilled

        private void parseUnitsKilled(java.lang.String[] details)
        Parses a String array of details in to an new Challenge where the SlickPlayer requires a number of SlickContinents to get the bonus.
        Parameters:
        details - A String array where:
        1. The goal of the challenge
        2. The reward of the challenge

      • parseCountriesOwned
